college_info.name: Canara Engineering College
college_info.vision: To be an Engineering Institute of highest repute and produce world-class engineers catering to the needs of mankind
college_info.mission: Provide the right environment to develop quality education for all, irrespective of caste, creed or religion to produce future leaders

library.name: Central Library
library.description: More than 43,000 books of various genres in a state-of-art infrastructure of 1,300 square meters

sports.name: Sports & Physical Activities
sports.description: Indoor and outdoor facilities for games and physical activities

internet.name: High-Speed Internet
internet.description: 600 Mbps leased line internet with unlimited usage

transport.name: College Transportation
transport.description: Around 20 college buses covering city and surrounding areas

banking.name: Canara Bank Branch
banking.description: On-campus Canara Bank branch with ATM

placement.overview: Dedicated Training & Placement Cell with strong industry connections
placement.recruiters: Leading companies across IT, Core Engineering, and Business sectors

exams: Theory Exam - Date will be notified
Practical Exam - Date will be notified
internal_2.note: Second Internal Exam timetable will be available soon. Check college notice board regularly.

exams: All subjects - Check VTU official website for detailed schedule

events.name: Branch Entry 2025
events.description: Cultural programme organized by Cultural & Arts Committee for 3rd semester students at Dr. P. Dayananda Pai – P. Sathish Pai Main Stage

events.name: Ayudha Pooja Celebration
events.description: Dussehra celebration with Rangoli, Bhajanas, and laboratory poojas to seek divine blessings

events.name: Tech Fest 2025
events.description: Annual technical festival with hackathons, coding competitions, workshops, and guest lectures from industry experts

events.name: Placement Drives
events.description: Multiple companies visiting campus for recruitment. Prepare well and participate actively

testimonials.name: Mr. M.B Padiyar
testimonials.quote: I had good interaction with students. It's really good. I enjoyed programme and it is really to be appreciated for total participation of staff and students.

testimonials.name: Prof. V L Narasimhan
testimonials.designation: Vice President, Srikar & Associates USA, Australia & India
testimonials.quote: A wonderful Campus coupled with a dedicated set of staff and faculty members. Please keep up the good work so that you can excel internationally.

testimonials.name: Dr. H R Guruprasad
testimonials.designation: Professor and HOD, Dept. of CSE BMSCE, Bangalore
testimonials.quote: A Beautiful Campus in the heart of nature makes it serene. Motivated faculty members with commitment.

testimonials.name: Mohith P Tahiliani
testimonials.designation: Assistant Professor, Dept. of CSE, NITK Surathkal
testimonials.quote: Had a wonderful experience while interacting with B.E and M.Tech students. They are very interactive and have a proactive approach.

motivational_quotes: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs
Education is the passport to the future. - Malcolm X
The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you. - B.B. King
Strive for progress, not perfection. - Unknown
Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead. - Nora Ephron
Engineering is the art of directing the great sources of power in nature for the use and convenience of man. - Thomas Tredgold
The engineer has been, and is, a maker of history. - James Kip Finch
